name: 3D Rally Car Racing - eXtreme 4x4 Off-Road Race Simulator Games
name_original: 3D Rally Car Racing - eXtreme 4x4 Off-Road Race Simulator Games
description:
Get ready for an adrenaline packed wild rally car racing game where you're goal is to go as F-A -S -T as you can down a wild road full of traffic. Along the way you have to avoid a variety of oncoming traffic and mayhem!

Do you have what it takes to win the race?

>> FEATURES <<

- Cool 3D graphics.
- Super simple controls.
- Non stop action! :)
